content.html: The irony of Netlify going down and taking our marketing website with it on the day we, an incident management company announce our fundraise is quite special, you have to laugh 😂. On the plus side, we have a great tool for this... 🤷‍♂️
content.value:
The irony of Netlify going down and taking our marketing website with it on the day we, an incident management company announce our fundraise is quite special, you have to laugh 😂.

On the plus side, we have a great tool for this... 🤷‍♂️
